name: Maternity Leave
description: Process for arranging maternity leave in compliance with UK law.

steps.description: Notify employer of pregnancy and expected week of childbirth in writing, at least 15 weeks before the baby is due.
Acknowledge receipt of notification and confirm maternity leave start and end dates within 28 days.
Provide MATB1 certificate (proof of pregnancy) to employer.
Assess eligibility for Statutory Maternity Pay (SMP) and provide written response.
Agree on maternity leave start date and discuss any flexible working requests.
Update HR records and arrange cover if necessary.
Begin maternity leave and keep in touch as agreed.
Support return-to-work planning and ensure compliance with UK employment law.

name: Paternity Leave
description: Process for arranging paternity leave in compliance with UK law.

steps.description: Notify employer of intention to take paternity leave, including expected week of childbirth/adoption, at least 15 weeks before the baby is due or within 7 days of being matched with a child for adoption.
Provide employer with a completed SC3 (birth) or SC4 (adoption) form as notice of paternity leave.
Acknowledge receipt of paternity leave notice and confirm leave dates in writing.
Confirm chosen start date for paternity leave and discuss any flexible working requests.
Update HR records and payroll to reflect paternity leave and pay arrangements.
Take paternity leave as agreed and keep in touch as necessary.
Support return-to-work planning and ensure compliance with UK employment law.
